about_the_game:
Super Grapple Day is an Adult Visual Novel about college women wrestling and also having sex. It features a branching story with meaningful choices, turn-based combat, and hundreds of exciting animations.

Welcome to Grapple Day!


You’ve been keeping a secret from your girlfriend. Every year, your fraternity hosts a private event that raises tens of thousands of dollars for charity: a no-holds-barred submission wrestling tournament featuring some of the hottest girls on campus. When your girlfriend finds out about Grapple Day, she’s offended. . . that you didn’t invite her to join too!

Features

  • Interactive wrestling fights
  • Nearly 5,000 images, including hundreds of unique 2D animations
  • About 6 hours of gameplay (plus additional story routes and an Endless mode)
  • A story of rivalries, romance, humor… and revenge!

What’s Allowed During the Grapple Day Tournament

  • Dirty tactics
  • Gloating
  • Humiliation
  • Stripping
  • Flirting
  • Sex

What's Not Allowed

  • Being a real jerk (you can only play one in the wrestling ring)

The Fight Never Ends

This definitive version of the game collects all of the previously released episodes and adds a ton of new content. In addition to the main story, the game also includes an all-new Endless Mode where you face off against randomly generated opponents. Level up your fighter and collect perks to try to set a new high score!

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes pro wrestling-style violence, profanity, nudity, brief mentions of alcohol and drugs, and graphic depictions of sex, including risk-aware BDSM, roleplay, and bondage

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

name: Super Grapple Day

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 640bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: Super Grapple Day is an Adult Visual Novel about women’s pro wrestling. Featuring meaningful choices and turn-based combat, it’s a story about regular college girls who risk it all for glory and excitement in a no-holds-barred tournament.
